actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 26 (3d12+7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 17 (3d6+7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Concussive Snap (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Snaps its jaws emitting concussive force in a 90' cone. Each creature in that area: 35 (10d6) thunder is pushed up to 15 ft. away from the drake and stops holding its breath if it was doing so. (DC 15 Con half damage isn't pushed and doesn't lose its held breath). Constructs and objects and structures have disadvantage on the save.

bonus_actions.name: Reef Stealth
bonus_actions.desc: If it is within 10 ft. of a coral reef it can take the Hide action.

bonus_actions.name: Siege Follow-Through
bonus_actions.desc: If it destroys an object or structure it can make a bite attack vs. a creature it can see within 5 ft. of that object or structure.

special_abilities.name: Tunneler
special_abilities.desc: Can burrow through coral and solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10 ft. diameter tunnel in its wake.
